department: Shared Services Canada - SSC - Structured Commodity
short_summary: Tier 1 Professional Services for Procurement Data Management and Analytics
description: Shared Services Canada – Task and Solutions Professional Services – Tier 1 – Procurement Data Management and Analytics
full_summary:
# Shared Services Canada – Task and Solutions Professional Services – Tier 1 Procurement Data Management and Analytics

## Tender Information

* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01012869
* **Solicitation Number:** R000127716
* **Publication Date:** November 8, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 29, 2022, 14:00:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None
* **Current Tender Status:** Expired

## Contract Overview

Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking a procurement data management and analytics services contractor through a competitive, selective tendering process. The contract will be awarded for one year, with three option periods of one year each.

## Service Requirements

The successful contractor will provide services including:

* Business consultant - senior
* Business architect - senior

## Invitation to Bid

The invitation to bid is open to Tier 1 supply arrangement holders who have qualified under the following categories:

* 2.3 Business consultant - senior
* 2.8 Business architect - senior

Eligible bidders include:

* Avascent Canada ULC
* Bridgetown Consulting Inc.
* Calian Ltd.
* Dalian Enterprises and Coradix Technology Consulting (Joint Venture)
* Maplesoft Consulting Inc.
* MDOS CONSULTING INC.
* MGIS Inc. and BDMK Consultants (Joint Venture)
* NavPoint Consulting Group Inc.
* Nisha Technologies Inc.
* Orbis Risk Consulting Inc.
* PrecisionIT Inc.
* IDS Systems Consultants (Joint Venture)
* QMR Staffing Solutions Incorporated
* SnapSEARCH Inc.
* The AIM Group Inc.
* Veritaaq Technology House Inc.

## Contact Information

* Contracting Authority: Julie Bampton
* Email: [julie.bampton@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:julie.bampton@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 613-790-5915
* Address: 180 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0P7, CA

## Important Notice

* Bidders are advised that Buyandsell.gc.ca is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language.
